synopsis.text: Demon spirits, fairies, and a new world await Yuan Ding, an otaku who finds himself transported from a mundane convention to the enchanting continent of Doya. Determined to prove himself as the powerful protagonist of this new world, Yuan Ding takes the entrance exam at the prestigious Shuo Yue Academy. When he fails, he stumbles upon an opportunity to become a gardener under the tutelage of an old gardener who presents him with a rare fairy seed. The seed, rumored to grow into the most powerful demon on the continent, had remained dormant for years. Can Yuan Ding succeed where others have failed and cultivate the seed? As he embarks on this journey to collect legendary fairies and demon spirits, Yuan Ding's life takes an unexpected turn when a succubus appears, adding a new layer of complexity to his adventure. Join Yuan Ding as he navigates this fantastical world, determined to change his destiny and become the hero he always dreamed of being.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
